description: Paul Cannon thinks he hits the jackpot and is finally going to get an actual Mormon between the sheets, but to his dismay he isn’t the only undercover Mormon in town. Jimmy Fanz has been doing this for years, and after Paul finds this out he suggests teaming up, but Jimmy has to make sure he is good at the game first. Paul plows Jimmy’s hot ass showing him everything he’s got.
title: Mormon Undercover Part 3
